subject: Mandatory Onboarding of AE/IE before Commencement of Services/ Mandatory Onboarding of Contractor before Appointed Date (AD) - reg.
text: HRdy 7 WTHfqifeta<ot (7335 4ae- & {ntHrf 434, TRd TTTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Tria Tn Gi-5 0 6, 8427-10, ETHT, T @qrit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 34N4/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI /Policy Guidelines /Consultancy /2025 Circular No.10.2.41/ 2025 dated February, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/IT/2021/A-App/ AE-IE/Consultant (Comp. No. 88777)} Sub: Mandatory Onboarding of AEIIE before Commencement of Services/ Mandatory Onboarding of Contractor before Appointed Date (AD) reg: Executive Committee in its 648th meeting decided that henceforth: The   Authority Engineer (AE) Independent Engineer (IE) shall be onboarded mandatorily on Datalake before the commencement of Services to ensure Effective Supervision and Contract Administration from the outset: (ii) The Contractor must be onboarded before the Appointed Date (AD) on Datalake to ensure timely mobilization and adherence to project timelines and seamless functioning of NHAI One app. 2. To ensure adherence, required facility is available on Datalake and the following steps to be followed: Datalake Users can utilise the developed modules of Contractor Onboarding and AE/IE Onboarding: (ii) with this the Contractor and AEIIE Team is to be onboarded on NHAI One Application to complete the Onboarding process_ 3. Detailed SOP for onboarding of AE/IE and Contractor is attached at Annexure - | & II, 4 All concerned Stakeholders viz GM (T) at HQ & PDs as well as Contractors and AEZIE are directed to ensure strict compliance of same on Datalake_ 5 If project is awarded at RO Level, then in lieu of GM (T) in Para 4, ROs to ensure onboarding on Datalake 6_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above xloalar (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation_  UU9 NHAI Policy 11th Along Copy
